channel.title: Video Understanding on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Video Understanding on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: NeuroClips: Towards High-fidelity and Smooth fMRI-to-Video Reconstruction
item.description: NeuroClips: groundbreaking fMRI-to-video reconstruction, achieving high-fidelity smooth video up to 6s at 8FPS by decoding both high-level semantics and low-level perception flows.
